bunker.proximity: Near secret military and nuclear research facilities
bunker.security: Guarded by elite unit hidden even from IRGC
bunker.comparison: More secure than Fordo nuclear facility

moscow_contingency.name: Moscow Contingency
moscow_contingency.description: Escape plan to Russia if regime collapses
moscow_contingency.passengers: Up to 20 family members and aides
moscow_contingency.parallel: Mirrors Assad's December 2024 flight to Moscow
moscow_contingency.negotiator: Ali Asghar Hejazi, deputy chief of staff to Khamenei
moscow_contingency.russian_assurance: Safe corridor guaranteed by senior Russian official

psychological_profile.description: Paranoid leader, weaker mentally and physically since 12-day war
psychological_profile.behavior: Obsession with survival, secluded himself during Israel conflict
